summary: This bill, the "Streamlining Thermal Energy through Advanced Mechanisms Act" or the STEAM Act, aims to expedite geothermal energy exploration and development. It amends the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to streamline the National Environmental Policy Act (NEPA) review process for geothermal projects, specifically those in areas previously studied or developed. The bill focuses on amending existing legislation to include geothermal resources alongside oil and gas regarding environmental reviews.
